#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
char s[21][21];
int n;

int check(int i,int j,int k)
{
    int vr,hr;
    int count1=0;
    hr=i;
    int count=0;
    while(hr<n&&(s[hr][j]=='X'||s[hr][j]=='.'))
    {
        if(s[hr][j]=='.')
            count++;
if(count>1)
    break;
        count1++;


        if(count1==k)
            return 1;
            hr++;


    }
    vr=j;
    count1=0;
    count=0;
    while(vr<n&&(s[i][vr]=='X'||s[i][vr]=='.'))
    {

        if(s[i][vr]=='.')
            count++;
            if(count>1)
    break;

        count1++;

        if(count1==k)
            return 1;

            vr++;
    }
    hr=i;
    vr=j;
    count=0;
    count1=0;
    while(hr<n&&vr<n&&(s[hr][vr]=='.'||s[hr][vr]=='X'))
    {

        if(s[hr][vr]=='.')
            count++;
            if(count>1)
            break;



        count1++;
        hr++;
        vr++;
        if(count1==k)
            return 1;
    }


    hr=i;
    vr=j;
    count=0;
    count1=0;
     while(hr<n&&vr>=0&&(s[hr][vr]=='.'||s[hr][vr]=='X'))
    {
        if(s[hr][vr]=='.')
            count++;
    if(count>1)
        break;

        count1++;
        hr++;
        vr--;
        if(count1==k)
            return 1 ;
    }
    return 0;
}
int solve(int n,int k)
{
int i,j;
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        for(j=0;j<n;j++)
        {
            if(s[i][j]!='0')
            if(check(i,j,k))
                {
                    return 1;

                }

            }
        }
        return 0;
    }
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
    int i,j,k;
    cin>>n;
    cin>>k;
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        for(j=0;j<n;j++)
        cin>>s[i][j];

   if( solve(n,k))
    cout<<"YES"<<endl;
   else
    cout<<"NO"<<endl;
    }
}
